main event: On September 18, 1964, three women reported observing a large lighted object descend to a meadow near Glassboro, New Jersey. The object hovered for 5 to 10 minutes before taking off at high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 40 feet in diameter,The local police found no physical evidence to support the women's claims,An Air Force investigator interviewed Mrs. Roestenburg and found no additional corroborating evidence,About 10 days later, the friends of Mrs. Roestenburg denied having seen the object,The case was ultimately concluded by the Air Force to lack evidence for the claimed UFO sighting.
witness description: Mrs. Jessie Roestenburg and her two friends, Mrs. Mildred Landis and Mrs. Katharine Nulton
